document.full_text: the euro kept close to a 17-month high against the dollar and stock markets hugged recent levels on thursday as investors waited for the european central bank to give hints on future interest rate rises.
document.title: investors on alert for "strong vigilance" at ecb
lines_and_colors: the euro kept close to a 17-month high against the dollar and stock markets hugged recent levels on thursday as investors waited for the european central bank to give hints on future interest rate rises.
